data.title: Ancestors of Amanda Miller
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

1. William Daniel Gobrecht

Neander Augustus Gobrecht+

2. George S. Thomas

Amanda Miller 2 3 4 5 6

Born: 11 Oct 1832, Hanover, York, PA 3 5 6 7

Marriage (1): William Daniel Gobrecht on 15 Aug 1850 1

Marriage (2): George S. Thomas

Died: 26 Nov 1928, Altoona, Blair, PA at age 96 5 7

Buried: 28 Nov 1928, Altoona: Fairview Cemetery, Blair, PA 5 7

FamilySearch ID: KGSC-PQP.

Noted events in her life were:

1. Census in 1850 in Hanover, York, PA. 8 The 1850 census recorded Wm. D. Gobrecht, farmer, 50, living on a farm valued at $5000 with Abdiel Gobrecht, 19; and Amanda Miller, 18. Everyone was born in Pennsylvania.

2. Census in 1860 in Franklin Twp., Adams, PA. 3 The 1860 census recorded Amanda Gobrecht, 27, living with son Neader, 8; Lydia Miller, 25; and Avilla Raffensberger, 1. The post office was Mummasburg.

3. Census in 1870 in Franklin Twp., Adams, PA. 9 The 1870 census recorded George Thomas, carpenter, 42, living with wife Amanda, 38; Leander, carpenter, 18; Adeline, 16; Isabella, 14; Ellsworth, 8; Elmer, 6; and Emma, 4. Everyone was born in Pennsylvania. The post office was Arendtsville. [Note: Leander is surname Gobrecht by Amanda's 1st marriage.].

4. Census in 1880 in Altoona, Blair, PA. 10 The 1880 census recorded George S. Thomas, carpenter, 53, living with wife Amanda, 47; Isabel C., 24; E. Elsworth, 18; Elmer N., 16; Mary E., 13; Minnie E., 9; and George E., 8. Everyone and their parents were born in Pennsylvania.

5. Residence: 1119 13th Ave., Altoona, PA on 4 Apr 1921 in Altoona, Blair, PA. 11

6. Cause of Death: chronic myocarditis. Contributory senile gangrene left foot., 25 Nov 1928, Altoona, Blair, PA. 7

7. Residence: 1119 13th Ave., Altoona, PA on 25 Nov 1928 in Altoona, Blair, PA. 7

Amanda married William Daniel Gobrecht, son of Daniel Gobrecht and Catherine Schriver, on 15 Aug 1850.1 (William Daniel Gobrecht was born on 6 Dec 1799 in Hanover, York, PA 6 12, christened on 1 Jan 1800 in Hanover: Emmanuel's Reformed Church, York, PA,12 died on 31 May 1859 in , Adams, PA 13 and was buried in Arendtsville: Old Reformed & Lutheran Graveyard, Adams, PA 13.)

Amanda next married George S. Thomas. (George S. Thomas was born on 29 May 1827 in , , PA,14 died on 22 Jun 1887 in Altoona, Blair, PA 14 and was buried in Altoona: Fairview Cemetery, Blair, PA 14.)
